James Ikechukwu Esomugha, nke a na-akpọ Jim Iyke, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Naịjirịa na otu n'ime kpakpando ihe nkiri Last Flight to Abuja n'akụkụ Omotola Jalade Ekeinde na Hakeem Kae-Kazim
Amụrụ  Jim Iyke  n'ubochi iri abuo na ise nke Septemba, n'afo1976 na Libreville, Gabon
Nne na nna ya bụ Maazi na Oriakụ Stephen Okolue, onye aha ikpeazụ ha gbanwere Esomugha site na Ogwugwu Village dị na Enugu Agidi nke steeti Anambra
Jim Iyke bụ naanị nwa nwoke n'ime ezinụlọ nwere ụmụaka asatọ
Ọ gụchara akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị di na FGC Kwali Abuja site n'afo 1985 ruo n'afo1991
Jim Iyke gụrụ akwụkwọ na mahadum Jos, Plateau Steeti ebe ọ nwetara diploma na Idosa Aku na Uba wee nweta nzere BSc na Filosofii
Jim Iyke malitere ime ihe nkiri n'afọ 2001
A maara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na -eme ihe nkiri kacha akwụ ụgwọ na Nollywood,  wee pụta n'ihe karịrị otu narị na iri ise (150) ihe nkiri
Ọ malitere ụlọ ọrụ na -emepụta ihe nkiri, Untamed Productions n'afo 2007
Jim Iyke malitere akara egwu nke ya, Untamed Records
Ọ wepụtara album mbụ, nke akpọrọ “ Onye ka m bụ?  ”Nke na-egosi ụfọdụ ndị egwu Naịjirịa dịka TuFace Idibia, na Sound Sultan
Vidiyo esemokwu nke Jim Iyke sị na ọ bụ 'nnapụta' na ụlọ ụka Synagogue of All Nations (SCOAN), nke ụkọchukwu TB Joshua duziri wee bute nnukwu arụmụka na soshal midia
'Mmụọ ọjọọ' ekwetere na ọ bụ ya kpatara na Iyke enweghị ike ịlụ nwanyị
Esomugha bụ onye guzobere Jim lyke Foundation maka ụmụaka nwere orusi pụrụ iche
Ọ gara Kenya na Disemba n'afo 2012 iji kwado Mgbasa Mgbanwe, ọrụ ebere nke Christopher Gray hiwere, na onye na -ese ụlọ egwu Jamaica Cécile
Iyke nwere eriri ojii na taekwondo
N'Aprel n'afo 2019, kpakpando Nollywood gara na peeji Instagram ya iji kwupụta ọmụmụ nwa ya nwoke nke o buliri foto na -egosi ya na nwa nwoke amụrụ ọhụrụ n'aka ya
Na Jenụwarị n'afo 2021, Jim Iyke kwuru na n'ajụjụ ọnu ihe gbasara omenka kachasị amasị ya, na ọ họọrọ Davido karịa Wizkid
